# Admissions
Learn more about the courses we offer, and find out how to make an application to join us.
[ ![Radcliffe Camera](https://www.ox.ac.uk/sites/files/oxford/styles/ow_large_feature/s3/field/field_image_highlight/Admissions.jpg?itok=zRuyN_cm) A view of the Radcliffe Camera on a summer's day. (Credit: Oxford University Images / Greg Smolonski) ](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions)## [Study at Oxford ](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions)
[ ![Students](https://www.ox.ac.uk/sites/files/oxford/styles/ow_listing/s3/field/field_image_highlight/UGA_Day2-23.jpg?itok=6yVu_-b0) ](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/undergraduate)
## Undergraduate study
Discover what life is really like as an Oxford student, including the courses we offer and how to apply.
  * [Discover student life](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/undergraduate/student-life)
  * [Find out what undergraduate courses we offer](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/undergraduate/courses/course-listing)
  * [Explore the different colleges](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/undergraduate/colleges)
  * [Find out how to apply for undergraduate courses](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/undergraduate/applying-to-oxford)
  * [Visit us](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/undergraduate/open-days-and-visits)
  * [Information for teachers](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/undergraduate/applying-to-oxford/teachers)
  * [Increasing Access](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/undergraduate/increasing-access)


[ ![Students](https://www.ox.ac.uk/sites/files/oxford/styles/ow_listing/s3/field/field_image_highlight/GAF-THUMB-Group-of-students-PAD.jpg?itok=g4fcPevs) ](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate)
## Graduate study
We offer a unique experience to graduate students. Find out about our postgraduate courses and how to apply.
  * [Find out about each department and the courses they offer](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/courses)
  * [Learn about postgraduate college life](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/colleges/introducing-colleges)
  * [Over 1,100 graduate scholarships are available](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/fees-and-funding/funding)
  * [Why study at Oxford?](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/why-oxford)
  * [Information for international applicants](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/international-applicants)
  * [Read our step-by-step Application Guide](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/application-guide)


[ ![people at a seminar](https://www.ox.ac.uk/sites/files/oxford/styles/ow_listing/s3/field/field_image_highlight/ContedImage.jpg?itok=SIagosqe) ](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/continuing-education)
## Lifelong learning
Adult learning: more than 1000 part-time courses and programmes offered each year.
  * [Undergraduate qualifications](https://www.conted.ox.ac.uk/about/undergraduate-award-courses?utm_source=oxadmissions&utm_medium=websitelink&utm_campaign=ox-uni-admissions-ug-list-link)
  * [Postgraduate qualifications](https://www.conted.ox.ac.uk/about/postgraduate-award-courses?utm_source=oxadmissions&utm_medium=websitelink&utm_campaign=ox-uni-admissions-pg-list-link)
  * [Short online courses](https://www.conted.ox.ac.uk/about/study-online-with-oxford?utm_source=oxadmissions&utm_medium=websitelink&utm_campaign=ox-uni-admissions-shortonline-list-link)
  * [Weekly classes](https://www.conted.ox.ac.uk/about/weekly-classes?utm_source=oxadmissions&utm_medium=websitelink&utm_campaign=ox-uni-admissions-weekly-list-link)
  * [Day and weekend events](https://www.conted.ox.ac.uk/about/day-and-weekend?utm_source=oxadmissions&utm_medium=websitelink&utm_campaign=ox-uni-admissions-dw-list-link)
  * [Summer schools](https://www.conted.ox.ac.uk/about/summer-schools?utm_source=oxadmissions&utm_medium=websitelink&utm_campaign=ox-uni-admissions-summer-list-link)
  * [Continuing professional development](https://www.conted.ox.ac.uk/about/continuing-professional-development?utm_source=oxadmissions&utm_medium=websitelink&utm_campaign=ox-uni-admissions-cpd-list-link)

# International Oxford
Oxford's international profile rivals that of any university in the world, highlighted by the breadth and depth of its research collaborations and a truly global student body and academic staff.
## Oxford's global links
Oxford University has connections worldwide. Click on the map to find out more.[  
](https://www.ox.ac.uk/content/oxfords-global-links)
  * [Asia - East](https://www.ox.ac.uk/about/international-oxford/asia-east)
  * [Asia - South East](https://www.ox.ac.uk/about/international-oxford/oxfords-global-links/asia-south-east)
  * [Asia - South and Central](https://www.ox.ac.uk/about/international-oxford/asia-south-and-central)
  * [Europe](https://www.ox.ac.uk/about/international-oxford/europe)
  * [Middle East & North Africa](https://www.ox.ac.uk/about/international-oxford/oxfords-global-links/middle-east-north-africa)
  * [Oceania](https://www.ox.ac.uk/about/international-oxford/oxfords-global-links/oceania)

# College life
All graduate students (except those on non-matriculated courses) are members of both a department or faculty and a college or hall. In this section, you can find out more about Oxford's colleges, how to state a college preference in your application and the facilities that are available. 
[ ![A New College quad](https://www.ox.ac.uk/sites/files/oxford/styles/ow_listing/s3/field/field_image_main/GAF%20Naoise%20Dolan%20-%20New%20College%20%28cropped%29.jpg?itok=eIk_nyMi) What is an Oxford college? All Oxford’s colleges and halls offer an extra dimension to student life at Oxford. ](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/colleges/introducing-colleges)
[ ![Sunset over Oxford](https://www.ox.ac.uk/sites/files/oxford/styles/ow_listing/s3/field/field_image_main/GAF%20Sunset%20Elizabeth%20Nyikos.jpg?itok=35Rl0YBJ) Living in Oxford Oxford University doesn’t have a campus—the University and its colleges are spread across the beautiful city of Oxford. ](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/colleges/living-in-oxford)
[ ![A student walking by the side of a pond](https://www.ox.ac.uk/sites/files/oxford/styles/ow_listing/s3/field/field_image_main/Ahmad%20El%20Naggar%2C%20Worcester%20College.jpg?itok=GUyJ2qE6) Choosing a college Find out how to state a college preference in your application or ask us to find a college for you. ](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/colleges/choosing-college)
[ ![This is Graduate Oxford](https://www.ox.ac.uk/sites/files/oxford/styles/ow_two_column_highlight/s3/media-youtube/e0qVMjfvyfU.jpg?itok=pbVZif95) This is Graduate Oxford The University has an international reputation for world-leading research, teaching and resources, and combine this with a beautiful and historic city, it is alive with activity, attracting students from all over the world. ](https://www.ox.ac.uk/content/graduate-oxford-0?innerWidth=90%25&innerHeight=90%25)
[ ![Spring at Nuffield College](https://www.ox.ac.uk/sites/files/oxford/styles/ow_listing/s3/field/field_image_main/steve-langton_spring-at-nuffield_33727903391_o.jpg?itok=8t_FbSOM) College listing Find out more about the University's colleges and permanent private halls. ](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/colleges/college-listing)

# UNIQ+
**UNIQ+ Research Internships** are aimed at talented undergraduates from under-represented groups, who would find continuing into postgraduate study a challenge for reasons other than their academic ability.

# Increasing access
The University and colleges are doing more than ever to increase the number of promising postgraduate students from under-represented groups at Oxford.
[ ![Oxford skyline with the UNIQ plus logo](https://www.ox.ac.uk/sites/files/oxford/styles/ow_listing/s3/field/field_image_highlight/UNIQ%2B370x222.png?itok=Q7L5J0pe) UNIQ+ UNIQ+ is our flagship graduate access programme aimed at talented undergraduates who would find continuing into postgraduate study a challenge for reasons other than their academic ability. ](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/access/uniq-plus?source=access)
[ ![Radcliffe square at dawn with the Academic Futures logo](https://www.ox.ac.uk/sites/files/oxford/styles/ow_listing/s3/field/field_image_highlight/Academic%2B370x222.png?itok=DHb2YCq_) Academic Futures Academic Futures is a series of scholarship programmes that will address underrepresentation and help improve equality, diversity and inclusion in our graduate student body. ](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/fees-and-funding/fees-funding-and-scholarship-search/academic-futures)
[ ![A sunset with the Maths Institute and Green Templeton College](https://www.ox.ac.uk/sites/files/oxford/styles/ow_listing/s3/field/field_image_highlight/GAF-Maths-Institute-Sheng-Peng.jpg?itok=oSvMrspM) Funding for under-represented groups A range of scholarships are available to support applicants from under-represented groups to undertake graduate study at Oxford. ](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/fees-and-funding/funding/under-represented-groups)
[ ![Academic Futures: Realising potential and increasing diversity in our graduate students](https://www.ox.ac.uk/sites/files/oxford/styles/ow_two_column_highlight/s3/media-youtube/1r5PI3GXk_M.jpg?itok=qgynxZf2) Academic Futures Up to 80 full Academic Future scholarships are available across 5 programme streams, with the awards made possible through the generous support of a number of partners, including colleges, departments, divisions and external donors. ](https://www.ox.ac.uk/content/academic-futures?innerWidth=90%25&innerHeight=90%25)
[ ![The Richard Doll building against a blue sky](https://www.ox.ac.uk/sites/files/oxford/styles/ow_listing/s3/field/field_image_main/The%20Richard%20Doll%20Building%2C%20Cancer%20Epidemiology%20Unit%20Oxford_0.jpg?itok=Gl2TMrQi) Initiatives to improve access to graduate study In addition to UNIQ+, Academic Futures and funding for under-represented groups, we have launched other pioneering initiatives to improve access to graduate study. ](https://www.ox.ac.uk/admissions/graduate/access/initiatives-to-improve-access)
